description: This file implements a debugging logging module for a C project, which outputs log messages to standard output (STDOUT). It includes functions for initialization, closure, message logging with severity levels, and timestamping. The code is conditionally compiled based on build configuration.

methods.name: void initIcLogger()
methods.description: Initializes the logger; in this implementation, does nothing as STDOUT is used.

methods.name: void closeIcLogger()
methods.description: Closes the logger; in this implementation, does nothing as STDOUT is used.

methods.name: void icLogMsg(const char * file,size_t filelen,const char * func,size_t funclen,long line,const char * categoryName,logPriority priority,const char * format,...)
methods.description: Logs a message with specified category, priority, file, function, and line info; formats and outputs to STDOUT.

methods.name: void printCurrentTime()
methods.description: Helper function that prints the current local time with milliseconds precision.

ctags.name: icLogMsg
ctags.signature: (const char * file,size_t filelen,const char * func,size_t funclen,long line,const char * categoryName,logPriority priority,const char * format,...)
